member.name: T:AzureFunctions.Worker.Extensions.ApplicationInsights.ApplicationInsightsExtensionStartup
member.summary: Registers ApplicationInsights middleware that converts In-Proc dependency calls into request

member.name: T:AzureFunctions.Worker.Extensions.ApplicationInsights.Internal.FunctionActivityCoordinator
member.summary: Helps to exchange between HTTP triggered function in order to set additional HTTP related information

member.name: T:AzureFunctions.Worker.Extensions.ApplicationInsights.Internal.FunctionApplicationInsightsMiddleware
member.summary: Starts operation based on worker host activity. Request telemetry could be hijacked by HTTP middleware if function is triggered by HTTP

member.summary: Starts operation based on worker host activity. Request telemetry could be hijacked by HTTP middleware if function is triggered by HTTP

member.name: T:AzureFunctions.Worker.Extensions.ApplicationInsights.Internal.FunctionTelemetryProcessor
member.summary: Filters out internal function context properties and maps any properties to request

member.summary: Filters out internal function context properties and maps any properties to request

member.name: T:AzureFunctions.Worker.Extensions.ApplicationInsights.Internal.StartupFilter
member.summary: Registers application middleware responsible to initialize during function HTTP triggered execution
